reviewText: Dissappointed...I love this show, but these do not play on my DVD player.
It doesn't play in dvd players in us. It should say this right up front
I returned both seasons because I couldn't watch it at all here in the USA. I bought  it somewhere eles. Not Happy!
The dvd won't play on any dvd player all it does is say wrong region
love all the dvds, too bad they are not making anymore seasons
Amazing, they work perfectly on my laptop you have to get a multi-region DVD player to play them on a DVD player but they do work
This product will not work in a "region 1" dvd player. Only works in Europe.  I feel like this should be part of the discription.
THESE DISCS DO NOT PLAY ON DVD PLAYERS IN THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA.
Did not play on any device....not one CD...won't refund me since I had to buy multiple players by the time I wanted to return they indicated it was to late:(
DOES NOT WORK ON ANY DVD PLAYER I TRY!

One thing good about NOT watching a lot of TV....  Is when I catch a show, like this, in Syndication, it is all NEW for me.  I saw a couple of episodes of this show, and it made me laugh happily.  Fun like the Happy Dayz, Rozanne, and Frazier and other such easy to watch shows.  If you like easy Sitcoms, that poke fun at this, or that, you'll enjoy this one.

These don't work in the us. They say it says that in the comments so they will not allow me to return this. I do not remember seeing that or so many negative reviews when I purchased it. I am very angry that I will not be getting my money back for these dvds that don't even work! Works on regions 2,4,5 I believe.

I had to return all of these disks because they were all blank . This was a gift for my mother-in-law and she had to pay postage to mail it back to me so I could return them.  I reordered them and will see how the new ones work.
